change.item: Added folder for Postma, Herman. Updated titlepage.
PUBLIC "-//University Archives//TEXT (US::NDD::::Biographical Reference Collection)//EN" uabio.xml converted from EAD 1.0 to 2002 by v1to02.xsl (sy2003-10-15).
Also, the top level of the finding aid (above the dsc) was changed to conform to the NC EAD Best Practice Guidelines. Within the dsc, dates for series were normalized.

titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the Biographical Reference Collection, 1972 - 2004
titlepage.publisher:
University Archives
Duke University
Durham, North Carolina 27708-0202 USA

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult University Archives, Duke University.
did.abstract: The Biographical Reference Collection contains files of clippings, publications, biographical sketches, curriculum vitae, and other materials about the activities of Duke University administration, faculty, staff, and alumni, as well as other people connected or associated with the University, including members of the Duke family. These files were compiled from a variety of sources by University Archives staff for use in reference and research.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright for Official University records is held by Duke University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Biographical Reference Collection, Duke University Archives, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Biographical Reference Collection was compiled by University Archives staff from a variety of sources.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Updated by Josh Larkin Rowley, December 2010
Updated by Maureen McCormick Harlow, March, 2013
This finding aid is NCEAD compliant.

controlaccess.head: Subject Headings
controlaccess.p: These and related materials may be accessed under the following subject headings in the Duke University Libraries online catalog.
